meanings.definition: The condition of paralysis affecting the lower half of the body and both legs.
meanings.sent1: After the accident, he was diagnosed with paraplegias and had difficulty moving his legs.

meanings.sent5: The artist's painting vividly depicted the struggles of those living with paraplegias.
